Block_3.Title: Live chat exclusive offers
Block_3.Content: Members receive a 30% bonus on their first deposit

TextSection.Title: Extremely Smoothing Experience
TextSection.Content_1: The world's first integrated entertainment native APP, massive sports, e-sports events and live entertainment.
TextSection.Content_2: We have chess and card games,lottery betting, electronic games and other entertainment items. Scan the code to download immediately.

ActivityRules.first: Anyone who registers on the platform for the first recharge of 100 baht or more will get 100% refund
ActivityRules.two: You will receive items  for 30 days
ActivityRules.three: The betting flow does not include game types such as tumbling, Water Margin, Lucky Six Lions, etc.
ActivityRules.four: Each player with the same payment method (same debit card, credit card, bank account) and IP address can only enjoy the offer once. If the member has repeated account application, the company reserves the right to cancel or withdraw the member bonus
ActivityRules.five: All the discounts of our company are specially designed for players. If any group or individual is found to claim bonuses or any threats in a dishonest way, abuse of company discounts, etc., the company reserves, freezes, and cancels the rights of the group or individual account balance , The company reserves the right of final interpretation
ActivityRules.six: Event prizes can be divided by double the turnover

ActivityRules.first: Recharge in the recharge activity area, and you can get a bonus of up to 2% of the recharge amount, pen recharge, pen and pen free
ActivityRules.two: The bet needs to reach twice the turnover of the recharge, and then you can withdraw it. If the bet does not reach the double turnover, the gift bonus will be deducted when withdrawing.
ActivityRules.three: For example: top up 100 baht gold coins and get 1 yuan gold coin. After betting 100 baht gold coins, there is no limit to withdrawing. If the bet does not reach 100 yuan, 1 baht gold coin will be deducted when withdrawing.
ActivityRules.four: The betting flow does not include bets on game types such as Overwhelming, Water Margin, and Lucky Six Lions.

ActivityNews_3.Title: Rebate blood and rebate, give charcoal in the snow to help you make a comeback

ActivityRules.first: During the event period, accounts with a loss of 1,000 baht or more from Monday to Saturday can apply for the blood rebate on this Saturday
ActivityRules.two: You can receive the blood rebate transfer fee on Sundays
ActivityRules.three: The same IP, the same member, the same name withdrawing bank card number cannot be repeated, any member or group playing the game in an abnormal way
ActivityRules.four: In order to avoid differences in text understanding, the final interpretation right of this event belongs to the official
